source: Fit Skin Clinic website (client testimonials section)

reviews.author: Emily Walker
reviews.text: I’ve tried many facials in the past, but nothing compares to the customised chemical peel treatment at Fit Skin Clinic. My skin looks glowing and youthful. I’m definitely coming back!

reviews.author: Daisy Willson
reviews.text: I was a bit unsure about LED therapy, but after just a few sessions, my acne cleared up, and my skin looks radiant. Highly recommend this clinic to anyone looking for quality skin care treatments.

reviews.author: Olivia Brown
reviews.text: The epidermal levelling treatment was fantastic! It removed the dead skin and peach fuzz, leaving my face feeling incredibly soft and smooth. Amanda’s expertise really shines through.

reviews.author: Lia Harris
reviews.text: I’ve struggled with uneven skin tone for years, but after my skin needling session at Fit Skin Clinic, I noticed a huge difference. My skin is finally smooth and radiant!

reviews.author: Sarah Johnson
reviews.text: I had a wonderful experience at Fit Skin Clinic! Amanda’s expertise in skin needling transformed my skin, and I noticed a significant improvement in texture and brightness. I highly recommend this skin care clinic!

reviews.author: Julia Stevens
reviews.text: The microdermabrasion treatment was amazing! My skin feels smoother and fresher than ever. The staff is friendly, and Amanda is an absolute professional. I’m so happy with my results!
